Today I chose issue 1866 for discussion!

Move module below group_power in the import hierarchy
Created by @Yury G. Kudryashov (@urkud) on 2020-01-08
Labels: RFC, needs-refactor

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

Today I chose issue 1866 for discussion!

Move module below group_power in the import hierarchy
Created by @Yury G. Kudryashov (@urkud) on 2020-01-08
Labels: RFC, needs-refactor

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
At this point I'd almost argue the reverse, we have npow and npow_zero' as a field of monoid now, yet have no non-protected way of accessing those proofs until group_power is imported
